name: Virtual Blindness
description:
In this game you are blind.
Only things visible in the gameworld are things that you can hear or touch.

The objective of the game is to reach the elevator and evacuate the area.

However you are not alone.. There is a security Rover, trying to capture you.
Getting yourself captured restarts the game.

This game was created for the Global Game Jam 2014, and won a honorable mention from the Finnish Game Jam association.

Minimum Requirements:
- Oculus Rift
- Razer Hydra
